name: Maid Blade (Tsurugi)
description:
As the master of your maid, you enter the dungeon to battle.

While there are battles, these can be skipped with sufficient MP (Maid Power). You can toggle this to be ON/OFF.

Your maid always follows you. You can click on her to talk and touch.
While she cannot fight, she can support your travel, provide advice throughout your journey,
accept your sexual teasing, and soothe your libido with dedicated service.

The maid's obedience to her master is 100% from the beginning. If her master falls, she would follow.
What makes the maid so dedicated...?

As you progress within the dungeon, you and your maid accept the past, and advance forwards.

[Sex Scene]

All maids have special sex scenes!
Click on the maid when she is beside you to activate the sex scene.
This can be triggered regardless of where you are. Hve sex anywhere, anytime.

The maid reacts to your mouse click. This is dependent on where you click.
From consultation to recovery and sex... Your maid is there to satisfy your desires.
